DOC.brief_summary: This retrospective data analysis patient high blood pressure ( hypertension ) take metoprolol minimum 6 month switch take nebivolol minimum 6 month treat hypertension . These patient identify large medical claim database . This study test hypothesis ( alternative , high low ) average patient monthly health care administrative cost change switch metoprolol nebivolol .
DOC.brief_title: Economic Impact Switching From Metoprolol Nebivolol Hypertension Treatment
DOC.criteria: Be least 18 year old initiation metoprolol ( first date metoprolol treatment 2007 2011 ) Had one inpatient outpatient claim primary nonprimary diagnosis hypertension ( ICD9CM 401.xx405.xx ) Received nebivolol treatment continuously ( define supply gap < 30 day ) least 6 month initiation Received metoprolol treatment continuously least 6 month prior switch ( initiation ) nebivolol ( define metoprolol discontinue whereas prescription nebivolol fill ) Had least 12 month continuous enrollment ( verified use enrollment file ) : 6 month prior nebivolol initiation 6 month follow nebivolol initiation .
